survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with ergonomic equipment provided by the company to enhance workplace comfort and productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic chair provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure mobile-friendly display for radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic chair provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the height-adjustable desk provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure mobile-friendly display for radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the height-adjustable desk provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which additional ergonomic equipment would you like to have in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question. Ensure checkboxes are clearly labeled and easy to select on all devices.

script.question_text: Which additional ergonomic equipment would you like to have in your workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any discomfort or pain related to your workspace setup in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Binary response for quick assessment. Follow-up with Q5 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any discomfort or pain related to your workspace setup in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: Please describe the discomfort or pain you have experienced and its impact on your work.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Text input field should be large enough for thorough responses.

script.question_text: Please describe the discomfort or pain you have experienced and its impact on your work.

questions.question_text: How often do you adjust your ergonomic equipment (e.g., chair height, desk position)?
questions.client_notes: Frequency scale to assess usage patterns. Ensure clear labeling of options.

script.question_text: How often do you adjust your ergonomic equipment (e.g., chair height, desk position)?

questions.question_text: Did you receive training on how to use your ergonomic equipment effectively?
questions.client_notes: Binary response to evaluate training effectiveness. Follow-up with Q8 if 'No' is selected.

script.question_text: Did you receive training on how to use your ergonomic equipment effectively?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in receiving training on how to use ergonomic equipment effectively?
questions.client_notes: Assess interest in future training opportunities. Include a 'Maybe' option for those undecided.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in receiving training on how to use ergonomic equipment effectively?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall impact of ergonomic equipment on your productivity?
questions.client_notes: 5-point scale to measure perceived productivity impact. Ensure balanced positive and negative options.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall impact of ergonomic equipment on your productivity?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions regarding ergonomic equipment in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended for qualitative feedback. Text input field should allow for lengthy responses.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions regarding ergonomic equipment in your workspace?
